definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be in tumult or commotion (Ar. rajasa make a vehement noise; BAram. Aram. [[רְגַשׁ]], rga4 be disturbed, in tumult (Targum Ithp. often for [[הָמָה]], as Ps 46:6, [[שָׁאָה]] Is 17:12 f.; rguw4yo0 for [[חָמוֹן]] ibid.); but Syr. usu. perceive, so NH Hiph., but Hithp. fall stormily upon);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. Ps 2:1 [[רָֽגְשׁוּ]] why do the nations throng tumultuously ?
